snippet: The bill would open up several state tuition-assistance programs at colleges and universities and create a scholarship fund.
abstract: Democratic majority in New York State Assembly throws its support behind comprehensive bill that would make state financial aid available to illegal immigrants at colleges and universities; bill would open up several state-tuition assistance programs to illegal immigrants and create a private scholarship fund to help pay for their higher education.
lead_paragraph: The bill would open up several state tuition-assistance programs at colleges and universities and create a scholarship fund.

headline.seo: New York Legislators Propose Giving Illegal Immigrants Access to College Financial Aid
headline.main: Democrats in Albany Propose Giving Illegal Immigrants Access to Aid for College
headline.print_headline: Push for Illegal Immigrants To Get State Aid for College
